biography.title: Biography
biography.p1: Born in Bursa in 1980. He graduated from Selçuk University State Conservatory, Department of Acting in 2005.
biography.p2: He started his career at Bursa State Theater and was deemed worthy of the Direklerarası Lions Kerem Yılmazer Young Talent Award for his performance in 'A Very Original Play'.
biography.p3: He continues his work as a director, actor, and producer in international projects based in Switzerland and the Netherlands. He signs global projects with his own production company, Time Right Production.

intro.sinema: A 20-year journey in front of the camera. Feature films honored at international festivals, Turkey’s most-watched TV series, and projects for leading digital platforms..
intro.theater: Selected frames from theater stages reflect the artist's stage presence and character depth, offering special excerpts from contemporary and classical works.
intro.producion: Under the umbrella of Time Right Production, the work carried out by Zafer Altun extends into Europe through his roles as producer and instructor. Serving as the line producer for projects such as Edel Stal Group’s documentary film Simtronik and various international commercial series—primarily in Switzerland and the Netherlands—Altun merges this production-oriented vision with education. Through the acting workshops he conducts and the stage productions he directs in Zurich and Rotterdam, he continues to share his industry experience on a global scale.
